content.rendered:
Experience our

Badminton

Introduction of Badminton Academy

The King’s Club Badminton Academy has hardwood flooring and daylight illumination throughout. Trainers will assist members with everything from the right way to hold a racquet to choosing the right equipment. Youths of all ages can benefit from the services of coaches. We prepare beginners, middle-level players, and advanced players. Developing your technical skills and improving your fitness are the goals of our badminton training program for adults.

We provide the necessary support and resources for our children to participate in inter-school, state, national, and international Badminton tournaments, enabling them to rise to new heights In addition to promoting physical wellness, badminton reduces stress and tension. Badminton not only promotes physical wellness but also relieves tension and stress.

Features, Amenities & Benefits

Kings Club Badminton Academy provides the world class facilities 

  • Antireflective lighting solution
  • Power backup
  • Height clearance
  • Centre of excellence
  • Best coaching from a team of highly skilled coaches
  • Adequate parking space
  • Physiotherapist
  • Shopping zone for the equipment requirements
  • Wooden flooring with overall top-class infrastructure

Antireflective lighting solution

Power backup

Height clearance

Benefits

Here are some benefits that Wooden flooring Badminton court at Kings Club entails:
  • Shock absorption: Wooden flooring Badminton court provides shock absorption which is significant when an athlete impacts a surface. It assists to reduce injury for athletes by diverting enough force to the floor.
  • Ball Bounce: Wooden flooring Badminton court is equal to concrete in the amount of rebound measured. It provides a 100% bounce rating in comparison to concrete.
  • Easy Maintenance: It is easy to maintain & needs little upkeep once installed. It is necessary to mop the dust daily to remove debris from the surface & to ensure nothing clings to the surface.
  • Customization: Wooden flooring Badminton court is customizable as it can be easily changed in terms of the layout of the floor paint for refinishing which requires every 10-15 years.
  • Uniformity: Wooden flooring Badminton court delivers a uniform level playing surface for athletes. Non-uniform flooring is known to force athletes’ muscles to persistently adapt to sudden changes in playing surfaces which increases tiredness & energy consumption.

Types of Classes

Kings Club Badminton Academy has classes for all ages & levels. Our training programs are personalized and tailored to the characteristics of every training group using the precise methodology. We organize tournaments for each age group and in all the levels from sub-junior to senior national level. Also, make your summer more exciting and sporty by learning badminton at Kings Club Badminton Academy.

Upcoming Sports Calendar

The King’s Club offers a wide range of sports & events to people of all ages, from kids to seniors. It provides all the elements that make Kings Club a home away from home that is unique, special, and magnificent.  

Camp 1Camp 2Camp 3
From 1st April to 30th AprilFrom 1st May to 1st JuneFrom 1st June to 30th June

Level 1 = Beginner | Level 2 = Intermediate | Level 3 = Advanced

About Certified Badminton Trainer

CHECKOUT ABOUT OUR TRAINER
Raju

Our Trainer has trained many coaches & youngsters who have attained the top ranking and have represented School, University, Institution, State, and National Teams. He has trained top badminton players who did make it to the International level and have accord medals. Now, he heads the managing team & trains the students with special emphasis on technical and fitness.

Gallery

Testimonials

The badminton court is the highlight of the club. It is well-lit, ambient, and well maintained. The coach is super professional and experienced. All in all the experience is exhilarating!

Ravi Kumar

Infrastructure is great and very aesthetic too Club amenities are too good party hall indoor and outdoor Sports facilities like swimming pool snooker, Court and coaching is too good Raju coach is too friendly. Multi cuisine Restaurant food is too tasty and delicious.

Sharath Babu

Kings Club Badminton court is kept clean & have appropriate lights. Excellent facility...

Ramesh

Played badminton after ages and loved every moment. Great courts and extremely well maintained.

Kumar.MB

Nice floor, clean and not dusty like others. Grip is good and perfect. Lots of parking inside.

Deepak Jain

I really like the quality of the courts, seems like they are not compromised over the quality. It's really quite an experience to play there.

Manjunath

FAQ

1. Does the academy offer any special membership plan for families or discount for students?
Kings Club Badminton Academy is currently offering individual membership plans at a very reasonable price. We always inform our members when we come out with special plans.
2. Are equipment available at the academy?
We provide all equipment and gear for the game at our academy at affordable prices.
3. Is there a dress code?
Anyone who wants to play is needed to be dressed in proper sports attire and should be in non marking sports shoes with laces while on the court.
4. Are there changing rooms at the facility and parking for cars and two wheelers?
Kings Club Badminton Academy has a well-sanitized washroom and changing rooms for the players. There is adequate parking space outside the facility.
5. Can we come as a walk in?
We suggested that you pre-book and come in to play. You are always welcome to come in & get a view of the game from our gallery during the visiting hours.
